column5: BPS-Special Sat Only March 17/07 $17.88-2006 Berkley Lighting Rods IM-6  Enjoy the video folks-2:26 mins.
interesting video.  i haev heard of matress springs or bush tied up and sunk as cover.  its pretty cool what you can find when you have one of those under water cameras!  Cheers!
Hmmm  get your pallets here.... get your pallets here!!!
I can see it now... the Great Pallet wall of Lake Henry!!!
pallets eh? interesting.  I was thinking of sinking a christmas tree one of these years out from our dock, gotta reconsider that!
Pallets, skids, christmas trees are used a lot down here as fish attractors, they work! A good way to get fish to hold on a spot they normally wouldn`t. Also gives cover to baitfish and young fish.
